markdownRemark.html:
As you can see, many of my post’s picture are disappearing with big triangle, My account got some trouble a few weeks ago and as result, all picture are gone from the database. I’m currently pretty busy with work and events that I have no time to recreate the guide.  I apologize deeply for this inconvenience. I will re-create the guide somewhere within this week or next week at the latest. I hope your understanding regarding this matter.

 
Mandatory Alt+W motion 
Regards,
~Hourai Etealune~
